name: .ODOC
summary: Learn about .ODOC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: ODOC files are not meant to be opened. To open the cloud-based Synology Office document associated with an ODOC file, locate the file and double-click it. Provided you have access to the Synology Office document and Synology Drive, the document will open in Synology Office.
